action_skill.name: Blunt Weapons
action_skill.description_key: Do more damage with blunt weapons. Gain skill by using items from this group.

action_skill.name: Blade Weapons
action_skill.description_key: Do more damage with bladed weapons. Gain skill by using items from this group.

action_skill.name: Mining Tools
action_skill.description_key: Do more damage with mining tools. Gain skill by using items from this group.

action_skill.name: Construction Tools
action_skill.description_key: Do more damage and harvest faster with construction tools including the stone axe, wrench, hammer and the nailgun. Gain skill by using items from this group.

action_skill.name: Pistols
action_skill.description_key: Do more damage with handguns. Gain skill by using items from this group.

action_skill.name: Shotguns
action_skill.description_key: Do more damage with shotguns. Gain skill by using items from this group.

action_skill.name: Rifles
action_skill.description_key: Do more damage with rifles and assault rifles. Gain skill by using items from this group.

action_skill.name: Archery
action_skill.description_key: Do more damage with bows and crossbows. Gain skill by using items from this group.

crafting_skill.name: craftSkillWeapons
crafting_skill.description_key: Craft bows, crossbows, their ammo and handheld melee weapons faster and with higher quality. Gain skill by crafting and repairing items from this group.

crafting_skill.name: craftSkillTools
crafting_skill.description_key: Craft handheld and motorized tools faster and at better quality. Gain skill by crafting and repairing items from this group.

crafting_skill.name: craftSkillGuns
crafting_skill.description_key: Reduce ammunition crafting time. Gain skill by crafting and repairing items from this group.

crafting_skill.name: craftSkillScience
crafting_skill.description_key: Craft medical, chemical, mechanical and trap items faster and at better quality if applicable. Gain skill by crafting and repairing items from this group.

crafting_skill.name: Tailoring
crafting_skill.description_key: Craft plant fiber or cloth clothing faster and at better quality. Gain skill by crafting and repairing items from this group.

crafting_skill.name: Leatherworking
crafting_skill.description_key: Craft hide or leather clothing faster and at better quality. Gain skill by crafting and repairing items from this group.

crafting_skill.name: craftSkillArmor
crafting_skill.description_key: Craft armor faster and at better quality. Gain skill by crafting and repairing items from this group.

crafting_skill.name: craftSkillMiscellaneous
crafting_skill.description_key: Craft anything from the Misc Crafting group faster. Gain skill by crafting and repairing items from this group.

perk.name: Iron Spear Crafting
perk.description_key: Unlocks the ability to make an Iron Spear.

perk.name: Iron Club Crafting
perk.description_key: Unlocks the ability to make an Iron Club.

perk.name: Barbed Club Crafting
perk.description_key: Unlocks the ability to make a Barbed Club.

perk.name: Sledgehammer Crafting
perk.description_key: Unlocks the ability to make a Sledgehammer

perk.name: Steel Spear Crafting
perk.description_key: Unlocks the ability to make an Steel Spear.

perk.name: Hunting Knife Crafting
perk.description_key: Unlocks the ability to make a Hunting Knife.

perk.name: Spiked Club Crafting
perk.description_key: Unlocks the ability to make a Spiked Club.

perk.name: Machete Crafting
perk.description_key: Unlocks the ability to make a Machete.

perk.name: Compound Bow Crafting
perk.description_key: Unlocks the ability to assemble a Compound Bow.

perk.name: Crossbow Crafting
perk.description_key: Unlocks the ability to craft a Crossbow.

perk.name: 9mm Pistol Crafting
perk.description_key: Unlocks the ability to assemble a 9mm Pistol and craft 9mm ammunition.

perk.name: MP5 Crafting
perk.description_key: Unlocks the ability to assemble an MP5.

perk.name: Shotgun Crafting
perk.description_key: Unlocks the ability to assemble Shotguns and craft shells and slugs.

perk.name: 44 Magnum Crafting
perk.description_key: Unlocks the ability to assemble a 44 Magnum and craft 44 caliber ammunition.

perk.name: Rifle Crafting
perk.description_key: Unlocks the ability to assemble all high powered rifles and craft 762mm ammunition.

perk.name: RPG Crafting
perk.description_key: Unlocks the ability to assemble a Rocket Launcher and craft Rockets.

perk.name: Tool Crafting Stage 1
perk.description_key: Unlocks the ability to make a Fireaxe, Pickaxe, Shovel, Hoe, and scythe.

perk.name: Tool Crafting Stage 2
perk.description_key: Unlocks the ability to make a Claw Hammer and Wrench.

perk.name: Tool Crafting Stage 3
perk.description_key: Unlocks the ability to make a Steel Fireaxe Steel Pickaxe And Steel Shovel.

perk.name: Tool Crafting Stage 4
perk.description_key: Unlocks the ability to make a Nailgun Calipers and Tool and Die Set.

perk.name: Tool Crafting Stage 5
perk.description_key: Unlocks the ability to make a Chainsaw, Chainsaw Blade, Chainsaw Parts, Auger, Auger Blade, Auger Parts.

perk.name: Tool Crafting Stage 6
perk.description_key: Unlocks the ability to make a Small Engine.

perk.name: Minibike Assembly
perk.description_key: Unlocks the ability to make the Minibike Chassis, Seat and Handlebars.

perk.name: Leather Armor Crafting Stage 1
perk.description_key: Unlocks the ability to make basic Leather Armor.

perk.name: Leather Armor Crafting Stage 2
perk.description_key: Unlocks the ability to make Military Armor and NVG.

perk.name: Armor Smithing Stage 1
perk.description_key: Unlocks the ability to make Scrap Armor.

perk.name: Armor Smithing Stage 2
perk.description_key: Unlocks the ability to make Iron Armor.

perk.name: Explosives Crafting Stage 1
perk.description_key: Unlocks the ability to make gunpowder.

perk.name: Explosives Crafting Stage 2
perk.description_key: Unlocks the ability to make mines and pipe bombs.

perk.name: Explosives Crafting Stage 3
perk.description_key: Unlocks the ability to make dynamite.

perk.name: Explosives Crafting Stage 4
perk.description_key: Unlocks the ability to make exploding bolts.

perk.name: Explosives Crafting Stage 5
perk.description_key: Unlocks the ability to make TNT.

perk.name: Medical Crafting
perk.description_key: Unlocks the ability to craft herbal antibiotics, first aid kits and antibiotics.

perk.name: Chemical Crafting
perk.description_key: Unlocks the ability to craft paint, ink, beer, grain alcohol, and steel polish.

perk.name: ChemStationPerk
perk.description_key: Unlocks the Chemistry Station and Omnigel

perk.name: Leather Tanning
perk.description_key: Unlocks the ability to craft leather from animal hides or by scrapping leather items.

perk.name: Concrete Mixing
perk.description_key: Unlocks the ability to make bricks, cement, concrete mix and the xement mixer.

perk.name: Iron Working
perk.description_key: Unlocks Iron Plates for upgrading your base.

perk.name: Steel Smithing
perk.description_key: Unlocks Steel smithing.

perk.name: Robin Hood
perk.description_key: Increases damage with each rank, using a Bow.

perk.name: Legolas
perk.description_key: Increases chance to dismember or decapitate a zombie with each rank, using a Bow.
